testsuite.name: uc.seng301.petbattler.lab5.cucumber.RunCucumberTest

testcase.name: AC1 - A pet has a unique non-empty name, a strictly positive attack, and positive health stats.

testsuite.system-out: Scenario: AC1 - A pet has a unique non-empty name, a strictly positive attack, and positive health stats. ?[90m# uc/seng301/petbattler/lab5/cucumber/u1-pet.feature:3?[0m ?[33mGiven ?[0m?[33mThere is no pet with name "Ant"?[0m ?[36mWhen ?[0m?[36mI create a pet named "Ant" with attack: 2 and health: 2?[0m ?[36mThen ?[0m?[36mThe pet is created with the correct name, attack and health?[0m
